items.name: Impossible Escape
explicitMods:
Passives in Radius of Unwavering Stance can be Allocated
without being connected to your tree
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: She was the last of countless progeny bred to test the limits of limitless power.
In the cosmic prison of her birth, her siblings fought each other to the death
for supremacy. She alone reached her limit... and broke through.

items.name: Transcendent Mind
explicitMods: -1 Intelligence per 1 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
+3% to Damage over Time Multiplier per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius
3% increased Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% reduced Mana Recovery Rate per 10 Intelligence on Unallocated Passives in Radius
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: A keen mind sees what others do not,
makes connections where others do not,
and is dangerous in a way that others are not.

items.name: Warrior's Tale
explicitMods: 100% increased effect of Tattoos in Radius
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The story of a life, written in blood and ink.

items.name: Elegant Hubris
explicitMods:
Commissioned 96020 coins to commemorate Caspiro
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Eternal Empire
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves better than the past, but that confidence brought about nightmare.

items.name: Blight Solace
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Fire Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: Regenerate 0.25% of Life per Second
1 Added Passive Skill is Mortifying Aspect
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Damnation Creed
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Burning Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4% to Fire Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Burning Bright
1 Added Passive Skill is Fan the Flames
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Inspired Learning
explicitMods: With 4 Notables Allocated in Radius, When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain 1 of its Modifiers for 20 seconds
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: If you do not learn from a won battle
then you have already lost the war.

items.name: Pandemonium Glisten
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Fire Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +2 to Dexterity
1 Added Passive Skill is Burning Bright
1 Added Passive Skill is Cremator
1 Added Passive Skill is Widespread Destruction
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 6% increased maximum Energy Shield
6% increased maximum Life
6% increased maximum Mana
+22% to Damage over Time Multiplier while affected by Malevolence
Immune to Freeze while affected by Purity of Ice
Regenerate 1.40% of Life per second while affected by Vitality
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Brood Hope
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Burning Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Chaos Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Fire Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Blowback
1 Added Passive Skill is Burning Bright
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

37.name: Reservation Efficiency
stats: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

36.name: Mortifying Aspect
stats: Malevolence has 50% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency

15.name: Fan the Flames
stats: Ignites you inflict spread to other Enemies within a Radius of 1.5 metres

1012.name: Fire Damage over Time Multiplier Mastery

11.name: Cremator
stats: Ignited Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

34.name: Blowback
stats: Ignites you inflict deal Damage 8% faster
reminderText: (Ignite deals Fire Damage over time, based on the base Fire Damage of the Skill, for 4 seconds)
(They will deal the same total damage over a shorter duration)

1030.name: Fire Damage over Time Multiplier Mastery
